title: Relaxing Resort Overlooking Hervey Bay with Lagoon Pool & Urangan Marina Access
description:
Experience the laidback charm of Queensland's Fraser Coast with a stay at this contemporary hotel, offering calming views of the Great Sandy Strait. Overlooking the tranquil waters of the marina, Mantra Hervey Bay is the perfect base for exploring the region's natural wonders.

Your escape to this relaxing hotel come with a heated lagoon pool, sauna and fitness centre, ensuring your stay is as relaxing as it is adventurous. Set sail for a day of whale watching, explore the heritage-listed K'gari or dine at local seafood restaurants - the choice is yours.
offer_address: Buccaneer Drive, Urangan Hervey Bay, Queensland 4655, Australia
